title: Asset Forex News
text: Gold price consolidates below the $3,300 mark on Friday as traders opt to wait for the release of the US Nonfarm Payrolls report before placing fresh directional bets. In the meantime, the Fed's reluctance to cut rates anytime soon continues to underpin the US Dollar and weigh on the non-yielding yellow metal.

title: Asset Forex News
text: USD/JPY holds the Bank of Japan's (BoJ) interest rate on hold decision-led losses below 149.00 in Thursday's Asian session. The focus now shifts to BoJ Governor Ueda's press conference for fresh hints on the timing of the next interest rate hike as the central bank revises up its inflation and economic outlook.
